tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE faq_articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE faqs_tags (
   faq_id INT,
   tag_id INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (faq_id, tag_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (faq_id) REFERENCES faqs(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE faqs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  question TEXT,
  answer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tags (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE faq_tags (
  faq_id INT,
  tag_id INT
)
